attributes.contentHtml: I wouldn't do so. That would've been very unfair and unreasonable. I did 25 members from that discord, even though there were 50. I made sure that you did not screw over everything, though you decided all members should go. We still don't have all the members you had before, and the discord that I "nuked" could've fully recovered the 25 members it lost. You nuked 100 with $5 in ads. That is not equivalent to 25 in any way, shape, or form.

attributes.contentHtml: eraters U kicked 40 there are where some left which had higher perms than freezy. You kicked all u could. And I saw how much was left in amoung us. I kicked when it had about 105 members and at the end there were like 15 members left lmao. I also spent time on that discord with matt
